MDBM C API Documentation

General information

The above Modules link contains the API

  • Modules splits the API into several functional groups for easier logical reference.
  • The entire API is also available as a single page by using the Files -> mdbm.h link. This page has the logical groups appended together.
  • The Classes link does not contains C++ classes; it contains C structs.
